Skill.label: 4L Ranged AW (Elder Helmet with Min dmg)

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE NOTE "NERF ETERNAL MANA FLASK" is modified to reflect a lvl 20 AW on 3.10 release, the chest, weapons nor ascendancy node Unnatural Strength is not calculated which means the dmg will be significantly higher. We might want to use Empower as a support gem for the AW in case where the scaling is good enough and/or the weapon quantity scales with the AW gem level :)
If AW can clear well without clearing focused spectres: Use Charge generating spectres and skip unset ring
If AW doesn't clear very well use an Elder helmet with minion dmg & conc effect (If solar guards or Baranite Thamaturge) and use unset ring for convocation, this also means skipping dying breath from Animate Guardian to equip him with Victario's Charity for charge generatin vs single target. This also means no Melee Splash gem swap will be required from the AW themselves
